name: Slime Bros (leachim89)
description:
Created for the Quad Summer Jam (my first game jam). I used some free assets.

You play with two characters. 

Use w, a, d for the red character and arrow up, left and right for the green character 

Save one character. To reach the goal the characters has to work together. 

Both characters can stick to objects when you keep holding w or d / left or right. When the characters are standing next to each other they get a protective shield against enemies not against a cactus. 

gl, hf :)
